parameters.query: SELECT mc.id, mc.title, mc.script, mc.media_url, mc.audio_url, mc.video_type, mc.duration_seconds, ctt.topic_tag FROM media_content mc JOIN content_topic_tags ctt ON mc.id = ctt.content_id WHERE ctt.topic_tag = $1 AND mc.publish_status = 'published' AND mc.media_url IS NOT NULL AND mc.video_type IN ('youtube_middle', 'youtube_short') ORDER BY mc.created_at ASC LIMIT $2
INSERT INTO video_concatenation_jobs (job_id, topic_tag, source_content_ids, content_count, target_duration_minutes, status) VALUES ($1, $2, $3::int[], $4, $5, 'generating_joints') RETURNING id

parameters.query: INSERT INTO joint_narration_queue (concatenation_job_id, joint_position, from_content_id, to_content_id, generated_script, audio_url, status) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, 'completed')

parameters.query: UPDATE video_concatenation_jobs SET status = 'ready_to_concatenate', joint_scripts = $2::jsonb, processing_started_at = NOW() WHERE job_id = $1
